entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Content Negotiation in EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider #60590
  • Add API to support dyanmically generated OpenAPI schemas in document #60589
    10.0-preview3
  • Multiple X-Forwarded-Prefix header segments are not handled correctly in ForwarededHeadersMiddleware #60587
  • Microsoft Identity is not blocking users not yet confirmed #60586
  • Support async generator based streaming API in javascript #60585
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorWebInteractiveAuto, blazorWebInteractiveServer, blazorWebInteractiveWebAssembly #60583
  • Perf improvement: single_query #60582

Closed

  • Perf regression: updates #60562
  • Perf regression: json, json #60568
  • When I install Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server package, I encountered a System.TimeoutException #60271

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix overload resolution issue for Delegate and RequestDelegate #60593
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Always call virtual UpdatePasswordHash #60252 #60592
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add module initializer for Verify.SourceGenerators #60547
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix: Mark catch-all route parameters as optional (#60392) #60544
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3
  • Enable arm64 DEBs #60565
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add support for AddOpenApiOperationTransformer API #60566
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Setting the Description in a ProducesResponseTypeAttribute works correctly for Minimal API #60539
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25122.1 #60564
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • using one style approach for all 3 configs WebAssembly, Web and Server #56758
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Extensions: add more details on overload resolution topic #9169
  • Extensions: add details to lookup topic #9168

Updated

  • Collection expressions: inline collections in spreads and foreach #7864
  • Dictionary expressions: include collection arguments #9162
  • Revamp proposal for list patterns on enumerables #9165

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • References to dropped columns in custom migrations #35677

Closed

  • EF 9 not compatible with .Net 8? #35674
  • script-migration of an example in the doc doesn't work (adding raw SQL) #35662
  • Surprising behaviour using Conventions and EF.Functions #35653
  • Assignment to inherited field, bypassing an hiding field #35643
  • Calling .ToListAsync(), .CountAsync(), etc is allowed on any IQueryable instead of only EF Core Queryables #35666
  • Can I use `[ConcurrencyCheck]` with Cosmos DB to capture concurrent updates. If not, then how I can detect a concurrent update that failed. #35648
  • Will EF Core 8 Work with SQL Server 2022 Compatibility Level 110? #35630
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #35635
    8.0.x
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #35636
    9.0.x
  • IReverseEngineerScaffolder interface not exposed #35521
  • Scaffold not using CLR types for default values #35676
  • EF vs EF Core Change Tracking. #35671

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Invariant Culture for ChangeType #35675
    community-contribution

Merged

  • update branding to preview3 #35681

Updated

  • Update System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe to 6.1.1 conditionally #35651
  • Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35617
    community-contribution
  • Navigation test refactoring initial work #35652

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dot net MAUI does not support iOS 18.3.1 #28020
  • pdf is not scroll in webview maui iOS #28017
  • The header in a collectionview does not resize if you hide the content #28012
    Backlog
  • Some XAML properties (i.e. `DatePicker.Date`) give false positives when using nullable types #28010
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Remove Android API check for device test results #28007
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Windows] ScrollPosition changes while inserting an item into CollectionView. #28006
  • [iOS] Wrong TimePicker black bar #27999
    Backlog
  • [Windows] ScrollView is not scrolling to the bottom if in grid with *,auto Width #27998
    Backlog
  • Wrong filename from MediaPicker.Default.PickPhotoAsync #27996
    Backlog
  • The path 'XXXXXXX\Shared\MainLayout.razor.css' would result in a file outside of the app bundle and cannot be used like Issue #406 #27994
  • Entry Completed Event Triggered Twice #27992
    Backlog

Closed

  • [net10.0] macOS Controls devices tests won't run #27736
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [Android] Navigation/Layout performance issue #4149
  • Icon tab menu navigation don´t change #10205
  • Migrated Xamarin Form Application To MAUI, But Now Facing Memory Leaks, Slower App and ANR issues #28008
  • FilePicker doesn't take into account IsExternalStorageManager #6015
    Backlog
  • [IOS] [Mac] Page OnAppearing Is Not Triggered When Navigating Multiple Levels Deep and Returning with PopToRootAsync #27897
    Backlog
  • When pressing Tab, Drawing Control does not get focus on Mac #27997
  • [iOS] CollectionView 1's doesn't adjust its offset when resizing a footer #27962
  • .NET MAUI IOS Collection view selection colour is Grey when we navigate to other page and come back again. #27945
  • [iOS] CV1's footer doesn't increase its size #27978
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Implement TimePicker.ClockIdentifier #441
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] support Length Units such like `px` `rpx` `vw` `vh` #1295
    Backlog
  • ImageSource is not work when set Image.Source to file in external storage #6525
    Backlog
  • Android app showed a black screen #27983
  • Popup allows background interactions in .NET MAUI but not in Xamarin #27740

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix: Prevent duplicate Completed event when setting ReturnType in Entry #28018
    community ✨
  • [ci] Publish workload VS insertion zips #28016
    area-infrastructure
  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #28015
    t/app-size, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [iOS] Make sure the Window is available #28013
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 17 #28011
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the shape rendering issue when the IsVisible property changes #28002
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Button rendering overflow in StackLayout #28001
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix flaky UITests 7 #28000
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • Add test run message to device tests logs #27993
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] CollectionView with grouped data crashes on iOS when the groups change - fix #27991
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 9 #27743
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling ContextMenu UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 2 #27405

    platform/android 🤖, area-infrastructure, area-testing, .NET 10.0-preview2

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Enable generation of API docs in CI for .NET 10 #28004
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 11064473 #27982
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Set `UseRidGraph=false` on Windows (attempt 2) #27679
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [net10] Update aspnet as sdk, enable Blazor tests #27796

Updated

  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897

    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-gestures

  • Make ShadowTypeConverter public & nullable for .NET 10 #27984
    t/breaking 💥, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview2

    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to view Call Hierarchy on Primary Constructors in C# #77327
    Backlog
  • Improve CS0201 (ERR_IllegalStatement) codefix to suggest adding discard so that Action overload is picked #77324

Closed

  • Fading option is not activated on already opened files #77319
  • IDE0058 and IDE060 is incorrectly reported #77323

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow cohosting to make changes to source generated documents #77331
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update configs for 17.14 P2 snap #77329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support 'view call hierarchy' on primary consstructor #77328
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add XML Solution (SLNX) support to MSBuildWorkspace #77326
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Exclude generated files from compilation by default #77325
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Add nuget to documentation #77330
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 17.14 P2
  • Refresh diagnostics when fading options change #77322
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, 17.14 P2
  • Implement TypeScript ExternalAccess wrappers for AsynchronousOperationListener #77318
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, 17.14 P2
  • Fix typos #77316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.14 P2
  • Reduce allocations during completion in FilterToVisibleAndBrowsableSymbols #77315
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, 17.14 P2

Updated

  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disallow initializers on partial constructor definitions #77275
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Partial events and constructors: public API #77202
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Enable basic end-to-end scenarios of extension method invocation. #77320
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Null annotate MetadataHelpers #77309
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate Method [draft] #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Implemented IVsEditorFactoryChooser on AbstractEditorFactory class to invoke WinForms designer editor factory directly by VS Shell #77306
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • WIP: Implement SyntaxReplacer.VisitList #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle ModuleCancellationTokenExpression in AbstractFlow visitor #77310
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.12] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #77262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add peephole optimization to replace x86 SIMD instructions with smaller equivalents #112880
  • JIT: Wrong result with double comparison #112871
    10.0.0
  • Change the number of IOCPs used on Windows to 2 on larger machines #112870
    10.0.0
  • Disable spin-waiting in some cases when CPU quota is limited by default #112869
    10.0.0
  • [Tracking] New APIs for named synchronization objects #112868
    10.0.0
  • [outerloop] Assertion failed '(*use)->WasMorphed()' in R2R legs #112867
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HybridCache: span-based fetch #112866
  • [android] Add runtime logging support for CoreCLR on Android #112865
    10.0.0
  • SslStreamNetworkStreamTest failures "The remote certificate is invalid because of errors in the certificate chain: PartialChain" #112856
  • `RotateLeft` and `RotateRight` of BigInteger is buggy. #112854
  • Mono AOT compiler crashes with: condition `p - buf < buf_size' not met #112850
  • Test failure: global::JitTest_castclass_ldloc_cs.TestClass.TestEntryPoint() #112848
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Test.EmitterTests.TestEmitter #112847
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #112846
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBindingGeneratorTests.Collections #112845
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #112844
  • Test failure: ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.ComInterfaceGeneratorOutputShape.EmptyComInterface #112843
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.DataSetTest2.ReadXmlSchema_Nested #112842
  • Test failure: Interop/DllImportAttribute/DllImportPath/DllImportPathTest/DllImportPathTest.cmd #112841
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestBaseline_TestWithNestedClass_Success #112840
  • [API Proposal]: `using` support for ArrayPool #112839
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestEmitter #112838
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorParserTests.MultipleTypeDefinitions #112837

Closed

  • System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents sometimes throws #1785
  • ExpandoObject.ContainsKey and ExpandoObject.Keys.Contains return different results #39897
  • Could not load file or assembly ‘Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions, Version=6.35.0.0. Nuget version mismatch Microsoft.IdentityModel.Abstractions #110865
  • SuperPMI: Investigate MISSING data for Linux/arm collection #80162
    Future
  • Disabling IPV6 in .NET Core #107979
    10.0.0
  • Missing serialization constructor in StringEqualityComparer? #112877
  • Binary formatter alternatives for resource serialisation #80155
    Future
  • System.Memory 4.6.0 release issue with NET48 #109827
  • [API Proposal]: Add a TryGetProperty Method in JsonNode to Check for Property Existence #112852
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.ConvertTests.ConvertChecked failing with System.OverflowException #112286
  • AV in `Loader/binding/assemblies/generics/arilistienum/methods/exceptions/exceptions.cmd` with OSR stress #112681
    10.0.0
  • On Windows machines, Regex does not consider `\n` a white-space character #112822
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CollectionTests "Assert.Equal() Failure: Values differ" #112738
  • Memory leak using SslStream in dotnet9 running on Linux #110803
    10.0.0
  • Why is `MemberExpression.Member` ownership not resolved the same way reflection does? #30942

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Disable PerfBDN tests. #112886
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Document NDK upgrade process #112885
    documentation, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Delete old parameter ABI classification #112884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use precise multireg arg check for old promotion #112883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112881
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.x
  • Fix the unsigned right shift operator of BigInteger #112879
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112878
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize `BigInteger.Multiply` by Toom-Cook multiplication #112876
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix doc typo #112875
    documentation, area-System.DirectoryServices, 10.0.0
  • [Draft] callee type prop #112874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` #112864
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • arm64: Set zero flag for more comparisons #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    area-System.Net
  • Fix information flow about fingerprinting dotnet files in WBT #112859
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use certificate thumbprints from entire chain in SSL_CTX cache #112858
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Zero-diff part of "Use SSA-based ComputeRange" #112853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [infra] Add runtime-extra-platforms to build analysis #112851
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Modify buffer overflow logic for System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests.ReturnBufferWhenFullFiresDroppedDiagnosticEvent #112849
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Check for an empty string for the TimeZoneDirectory environment variable #112831
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Revert "Use rangecheck in assertprop (#112766)" #112872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix getting resource when `ResourceResolve` returns assembly with resource that is an assembly ref #112810
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Disable interpreter test on native AOT #112857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Narrow AddressFamily passed to getaddrinfo when IPv6 is unsupported #112642
    area-System.Net
  • Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112753
    area-System.Diagnostics, 10.0.0
  • Reformat `ZLibNative` comments #112585
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Remove thread pointer from AwareLock #112715
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove uses of old ABI information #112818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Check ISA directly when printing `JitDisasm` #112828
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift language feature] Implement generic return type in Swift async functions #3022
  • [Swift language features] Retain result in the generated Swift async wrapper #3020
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Hint the GC to collect large native memory blobs using GC.AddMemoryPressure #3019
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Implement Swift payload as SafeHandler to decouple IDisposable from the bindings #3018

PullRequests

Created

  • [Swift language feature] Implement generic parameters/types with generics in Swift async functions #3023
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] Add type for storing information about csharp type name #3016
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Update CreateAnExperiment.md #3021
  • Implement a change in IL API to use RuntimeHelpers.Await<T>(Task<T>) and similar helpers. #2951

Updated

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Document memory ownership and handling at the Swift–C# boundary #3008
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Functional tests for `InitWithCopy` and `Destroy` functions in value witness table #3009
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift shipping] Add `Swift.Bindings.Experimental` nuget to `dotnet-experimental` for device tests #3014
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't publish dotnet-sdkplaceholder installers #47073
  • Don't publish dotnet-sdk-internal installers #47071
  • SDK product construction is broken when aspnetcore moves ahead of runtime #47070
  • Introduce a 'PackPrivate' mechanism for private project reference packing #47066
  • Unable to upgrade Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility NuGet package manually #47061

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload set][Mac]With 9.0.201 SDK pkg installed, "Workload update failed: Workload version 9.0.101, which was specified in ..., was not found." happens after running "sudo dotnet workload update --version 9.0.101" #46885
  • Stop generating dotnet-sdk-internal-pgo files #47072

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change property used for after-publish target #47068
    untriaged
  • Move BuildWithNetFrameworkHostedCompiler to common #47067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use right hand side references even when not compatible #47065
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47064
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Third Party Notices Template to Source Mappings #47058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .net10 p1 to p2 in the table #47054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit version #47053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Throw error on PublishContainer when EnableSdkContainerSupport is not true #47047
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Clean-up in src/Layout/redist #46994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unescape slnf original solution path #46833
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Enable arm64 DEBs #47045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove dotnet-toolset-internal & dotnet-toolset-langpack archives #47059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2649696 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Add VMR step to validate asset baseline #46991
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Set target rid based on passed in prop, instead of host SDK #47023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow to fingerprint Blazor.js #46988
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • Try to re-enable APICompat in aspnetcore #45872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore .lutconfig files via .gitignore #47029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
